H0.text: The breath mint was less soluble than the toothpaste explains why, in Jamesâ€™s experiment, the breath mint disappeared by the following morning while the toothpaste remained at the bottom of the cup after being left overnight in water.

H1.text: The breath mint was more soluble than the toothpaste, which explains why it disappeared overnight in a cup of water while the toothpaste remained at the bottom.

H2.text: The breath mint had a lower density than the toothpaste, which explains why the breath mint was gone the following morning while the toothpaste remained at the bottom of the cup.

H3.text: The breath mint had a greater density than the toothpaste, which explains why it was gone the following morning while the toothpaste remained at the bottom of the cup after James let a breath mint and a lump of toothpaste sit overnight in water.
